[[חֲחִי]] 1Ki 3:25, 1Ki 3:25 + 3 t.; [[הַחֵָחִי]] 1Ki 10:7, cf. 1Ki 16:21; [[וׇêֵחחִי]] Ez Eze 40:42; [[וׇחֵחִי]] Da 12:7 + 13 t. (usu. c. Pashta or Tiphcha), cf. half of anything:—blood of offering Ex 24:6, Ex 24:6 (JE), beard 2Sa 10:4, a hin Nu 15:9, Nu 15:10, Nu 28:14 (P); curtain Ex 26:12 (P); week [[השׁבוע]] ´[[ח]] Da 9:27 etc.; [[אַמָּה]] ´[[ח]] half a cubit Ex 26:16, Ex 36:21 (P) +; esp. Be and [[מָנַחַת]] sub [[נוח]]).—On [[כבחחי]] 1Sa 14:4 v. We Dr.

middle [[הלילה]] ´[[ח]] Ex 12:29 (J) midnight, so Ju Jdg 16:3, Jdg 16:3, Ru 3:8; of garments 2Sa 10:4, 1Ch 19:4; altar Ex 27:5; of the Mt. of Olives Zec 14:4; [[יׇמַי]] ´[[ח]] Ps 102:25 the midst of my days (when they are but half done), Je 17:11.
